name: anonymizer
description: Anonymize work content. Scans for sensitive elements per area (employer/client/project/metrics) and asks user preference for each.

name: config
description: First-run setup wizard. Configures CLAUDE.md with identity and contact info.

name: content-strategist
description: Entry point for adding portfolio content. Decides what goes where (portfolio, LinkedIn, article) and routes to appropriate skills.

name: portfolio-copywriter
description: Write and improve portfolio website copy - hero, about, contact, project showcases. Focus on clarity, impact, and conversion.

name: quality-check
description: Final gate before publishing. Verifies all specialist skills have run and passed. Orchestrates, doesn't duplicate.

name: story-adapter
description: Transform work experiences into anonymized portfolio content. Use for case studies, highlights, achievements, and any work-related content.

name: update
description: Check for and install new or updated skills from the upstream kit.

name: voice-guardian
description: Review content for voice and tone. Catches corporate speak, ensures authentic voice matching your profile.

name: web-content-optimizer
description: Optimize content for web delivery - SEO, readability, images, mobile UX, performance. Makes content perform well, not just read well.

name: website-expert
description: Technical and design expert for the portfolio site. Explores codebase, implements changes, optimizes code, knows modern web best practices.
